title: Design and Deploy (DND)
content:
This section covers the following topics: 

  • Design and Deploy (DND)
    • Design - From the main menu of the Service Management Portal, select Build > Design
      • Service Designer
      • Service Components
      • Resource Offerings
      • Content Management
    • Deployment Operations - From the main menu of the Service Management portal, select Run > Deployment Operations
      • Instance Management
Before enabling and using the Design and Deploy functionality, you should install and enable Operations Orchestration(OO) Containerized capability. 

Related topics

To troubleshoot the issues related to DND, refer to logs related to the following microservices:

  • csa
  • server
  • maas_cloud_service_scheduler
  • instance_management
  • dnd-operations-gateway
  • maas_cloud_service

For more information, see Where to find suite logs.
